LanguageData.VME_IdeoRole_Patissier.label: pâtissier
LanguageData.VME_IdeoRole_Patissier.description:
A talented and epicurious provisioner of all things sweet. Capable of deftly altering any variety of meal into a most tantalizing dessert. Remarkably swift at cooking regardless of meal type.

<color=#E5E54C>Stats:</color>
 - The pâtissier receives a +20% Cooking speed bonus.
